Articles.Content:
He's behind the Great Firewall of China, which means file sharing/storage sites are pretty much impossible to use. Chances are, he'll have to wait until the final version is posted.

And I think I've bitten off more than I can chew with re-texturing Node 2. I can't, for the life of me, get the mipmaps to save properly.

You're right. I would like to ask you a Canadian robotic arm active it?You can put your CSS shuttle and the International Space Station MOD into my mail it? My e-mail address [\[email protected\]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#0d283a4f627d79646263283a49)?
NO but i able to use github

> 
> NO but i able to use github

I'll discuss the problem with my team.

Hope development on this mod hasn't stopped. Still using it and loving it.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![GxY1bnS.png](http://i.imgur.com/GxY1bnS.png)
Development has not stopped completely. For now, it is on hold while work on shuttle has completed.

> 
> Development has not stopped completely. For now, it is on hold while work on shuttle has completed.

Gotcha
Is somewhere available a setting for RO? Thanks
Mike, i have absuggestion for the future. Provide subassemblies of specific shuttle launched parts and payloads, particularly the iss solar panels
I was wondering if the RMS dock was working. Tried it today and the RMS didn't dock with the S0 truss.

Mike is this is normal..

if not how can i solve it.. please..

[https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96035968/KSP%202015-09-24%2003-30-34-72.jpg](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96035968/KSP%202015-09-24%2003-30-34-72.jpg)

> Mike is this is normal..
> if not how can i solve it.. please..
>

Are you in RSS?

> 
> Are you in RSS?

yes iam

Ok, I think I have seen this before. I think a simple reload should be able to fix the issue. I think there is a bit of a system resizing bug caused by the very nature of RSS/RO itself. I think a simple reload of the save should solve the problem.
dont know but i think i'll stop playing this game too much bug .. cant get the RSS with mike addons to work always a crash ..... always
Hey, it happens. If it will help any, try running in Opengl mode or using Active Texture Management (or even both)

> 
> Hey, it happens. If it will help any, try running in Opengl mode or using Active Texture Management (or even both)

thanx mate it working now fine without crashing but still i have the problem only with zarya it getting smaller..

another question on the Space Shuttel .. how can i activate the magnetic???
Been a while since i last used the arm...and that would better be served on the shuttle thread itself.
What happened to the dream chaser for RSS/RO?
I think mike put it on the back back burner for a while.
MIKE ISS need to be checked with RSS configuration Please....from P4 till P6 is much more smaller than the rest..
